title: MCL-R6 Style Contemporary Pendant Lamp
body: This 1954 masterpiece by Serge Mouille, the impressively MCL-R6 Style Contemporary Pendant Lamp was Mouille's modern take on the chandelier. It's six heads stretch out from the central fixture like the branches of a mighty oak tree, while the specific finish allows it to sit proudly at the centre of any room. Its hug radius mean that it can illuminate even the largest living or dining room, while the adjustable shades mean that the light can be brightened or softened depending on the mood.
